name: Akorn
description:
Brew. Fight. Survive.

It's almost winter, and you're a squirrel alchemist in need of acorns. However, your local forest has been taken over by poisonous plants!

Brew potions, fight plants, and find new recipes.

Please note: This is the Game Jam build of the game, which is quite broken, and the game is still in development.

Made at Pocket Jam #7 during PGConnects, September 27th - 28th 2022.

Credits:

Samuli Tuomainen - Programming

Henri Sarasvirta - Programming
